div.div: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita. r=1-sinÎ¸ (Heart)
The second season of Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita.
Comedy, Fantasy, Romance, Slice of Life
The second season of Hataraku Maou-sama! Sadao Maou returns for more shifts, now having to take care of a small girl born from a golden apple! (Source: Crunchyroll)
